Privacy Policy

Here at Gig-n-Jam we take our commitment to privacy seriously. The subsequent discloses our information gathering and dissemination practices for this website: Gig-n-Jam. This declaration may be restructured from time to time, so kindly check back every so often

Top Secret Information

We highly value the confidentiality of your information and will not be posted in your profile. Gig-n-Jam team may contact you for management purposes pertaining to your account. Also, we may use this information to customize your experience with Gig-n-Jam. Your hushEhush information will never be sold or disclosed or otherwise made available to any third parties. We will only disclose your personal information if it is legally required.

E-mail Address

Your eEmail addresses will not be revealed nor will we advertise it or make it available to any third party. However, there may be promotions and surveys which may appear on the site in which your participation is not mandatory and your participation in same may be shared with a third party. These circumstances will be disclosed on the site. By signing up as a member, you hereby agree to receive eEmail communication from us.

Profile Information

Your profile is accessible for other members to view at Gig-n-Jam. Member's profiles include a description and photos, individual and other information helpful in determining matches. Your viewable profile does not include any identifying information about you, except the username ("Online Handle") you chose upon registering.

Getting in Touch With Us

When you contact Gig-n-Jam via the support feature, we use the eEmail address and information entered to act in response to questions or problems about the Gig-n-Jam website. We may document your IP address, browser type and other technical information for use in diagnosing problems with our server, managing security and for demographic reference. We also sometimes collect this information for internal business purposes but not available to any person outside the Gig-n-Jam.com organization. We will only disclose this information if required by law.

Profile Information

We may use cookies to reduce the user's experience to bare bones. If you set your browser to reject cookies, the service may not be able to function as it should be. The Gig-n-Jam database resides behind firewalls in order to protect against the loss, misuse and alteration of the information under our control. We have taken precautionary measures to restrict access to sensitive data, as well as to detect and prohibit certain connections and operations by unauthorized users. While our measures exceed industr standards, no claim is made as to the impenetrability of the system under unusual circumstance or its resilience to future attacks.

Links

Gig-n-Jam contains links to other web sites as well. Please note that when you click on one of these links, you are clicking to another web site. We strongly urge you to read the privacy statements of these linked sites as their privacy policy may differ from ours.

Go Away, Spam

It is always a good practice to refrain from disclosing your eEmail address or any other information in chat rooms, public forms or anywhere else unless it's properly protected. Other persons may use information disclosed for many purposes, including spamming. Don’t worry, we won’t break your bubble!

Choice/Opt-Out

When you sign-up for Gig-n-Jam, you agree to receive eEmail newsletters and periodically receive eEmails about new services, improvements, planned service interruptions, etc. Our members can optEout of receiving communications from us by suspending their membership.

Notification of Changes

If we materially change our privacy practices or how we use your personally identifiable information, we will post a prominent notice on our site prior to the change.

We Want To Hear From You

We value your feedback and opinions; positive or negative! Should you have any questions about this privacy statement, the practices of this site, or your dealings with this Web site, feel free to contact Gig-n-Jam by clicking on the contact us link.
